mapper.sql: id, sc_id AS scId, name, url, type, size, thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl
mapper.select: SELECT sitmp.id, sca_id AS scaId, name, url, type, size, thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl FROM comm_imge_tmp sitmp LEFT JOIN supplier_commodity_audit sca ON sitmp.sca_id = sca.id WHERE sca.sca_id = #{scaId}
mapper.insert: insert comm_imge ( sc_id, name, url, type, size, thumbnail_url )VALUES ( #{scId}, #{name}, #{url}, #{type}, #{size}, #{thumbnailUrl} )

insert comm_imge ( sc_id, name, thumbnail_url, url, type, size )VALUES
( #{data.scId}, #{data.name}, #{data.thumbnailUrl}, #{data.url}, #{data.type}, #{data.size} )
mapper.update: UPDATE comm_imge SET name=#{name},url = #{url},type = #{type},size = #{size} WHERE id = #{id}
